item.help: Generate body of the button
item.name: button_body

item.help: Rather than use the back navigation from Cordova we want to trap the request and forward it on to a given button id, this will trigger the 'click' event on that button
item.name: Target_Button_Id
item.prompt: Enter the button id you want the device hard back to be deferred to

item.help:
When we define this attribute we provide the name of the button we want to run the buttonClicked function with,
if we specify this then we must sepcify the the Target_Button_Id as well. This helps us to work
around an issue whereby seemingly in older
versions of android (4.1.2) simply forwarding a click to a button does not actually work
item.name: Target_Button_Name
item.prompt: Enter the button name you want the device hard back to be deferred to
